---
title: "Temp Patterns"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r setup}
library(ggplot2)
library(data.table)

load("spp_master_ztemp.Rdata")
```

```{r temp in all regions over time}
ggplot(data = spp_master_ztemp, aes(x=year)) +
  geom_point(aes(y = max_sbt_temp), col = "red") +
  geom_point(aes(y = seas_sbt_temp), col = "slategrey") +
  geom_point(aes(y = min_sbt_temp), col = "blue") +
  facet_wrap(~reg, scales = "free") +
  labs(y = "Bottom Temperature (˚C)", x = "Year") +
  theme_bw()

ggsave(file = "temp_over_time_bottom.jpg")

ggplot(data = spp_master_ztemp, aes(x=year)) +
  geom_point(aes(y = max_sst_temp), col = "red") +
  geom_point(aes(y = seas_sst_temp), col = "slategrey") +
  geom_point(aes(y = min_sst_temp), col = "blue") +
  facet_wrap(~reg, scales = "free") +
  labs(y = "Surface Temperature (˚C)", x = "Year") +
  theme_bw()

ggsave(file = "temp_over_time_surface.jpg")
```
